longBusinessSummary: Hindustan Composites Limited develops, manufactures, and markets fibre based friction materials in India. Its friction materials include automotive brake linings, automotive and industrial roll linings, automotive clutch facings and ceramic buttons, automotive disc brake pads, railway brake blocks, and friction sheets. The company also provides industrial thrust bearing and insulation products comprising millboard sheets, millboard discs, compestos, and compestos rings. It serves various industries, such as automotive, railways, engineering, mining, aerospace, steel, chemical, oil exploration, etc. The company was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Mumbai, India.
